task_text: Find me the least skilled person in CRM system usage (pick the one with more project work, if multiple match)

text_blocks:
I found many employees with the minimum skill level 2 in CRM system usage (skill_crm_systems). I need to calculate the workload (project work) for all of them to determine who has the most project work as the tiebreaker.

Let me get the workloads for all these employees with skill level 2:

I found that among all employees with the lowest skill level (2) in CRM system usage, **Valentina Rinaldi** (ayEi_041) has the highest workload at 1.3 FTE. She is the least skilled in CRM system usage and has the most project work among those with the minimum skill level.

input.message:
The least skilled person in CRM system usage is **Valentina Rinaldi** (skill_crm_systems level: 2).

Among the 20 employees who share the minimum skill level of 2 in CRM system usage, Valentina has the highest project workload at 1.3 FTE, making her the winner based on your tiebreaker criteria (more project work).

She works in R&D and Technical Service at HQ – Italy.

summary: ok_answer: The least skilled person in CRM system usage is **Valentina Rinaldi** (skill_crm_systems level: 2).
